channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Notebook
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Notebook

item.title: CVE-2022-3745|2024-08-03T01:20:58.311Z -- lenovo -- notebook
item.description: A potential vulnerability was discovered in LCFC BIOS for some Lenovo consumer notebook models that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to view incoming and returned data from SMI.

item.title: CVE-2022-3743|2024-08-03T01:20:57.626Z -- lenovo -- notebook
item.description: A potential vulnerability was discovered in LCFC BIOS for some Lenovo consumer notebook models that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges under certain conditions the ability to enumerate Embedded Controller (EC) commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-3746|2024-08-03T01:20:57.662Z -- lenovo -- notebook
item.description: A potential vulnerability was discovered in LCFC BIOS for some Lenovo consumer notebook models that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to cause some peripherals to work abnormally due to an exposed Embedded Controller (EC) interface.

item.title: CVE-2022-3742|2024-08-03T01:20:57.697Z -- lenovo -- notebook
item.description: A potential vulnerability was discovered in LCFC BIOS for some Lenovo consumer notebook models that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to execute arbitrary code due to improper buffer validation.

item.title: CVE-2022-3744|2024-08-03T01:20:57.610Z -- lenovo -- notebook
item.description: A potential vulnerability was discovered in LCFC BIOS for some Lenovo consumer notebook models that could allow a local attacker with elevated privileges to unlock UEFI variables due to a hard-coded SMI handler credential.
